name: Mortality from all forms of violence  (IHME (2016))
title: Mortality from all forms of violence  (IHME (2016))
description: Data was amended by Our World in Data to represent the total number of deaths and age-standardized death rate from all forms of violence. This includes the IHME GBD categories of 'interpersonal violence'; 'conflict and terrorism' and 'executions and police conflict'.

sources.name: Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation, GBD (amended by OWID)
sources.dataPublishedBy: Global Burden of Disease Collaborative Network. Global Burden of Disease Study 2016 (GBD 2016) Results. Seattle, United States: Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation (IHME), 2017.
sources.additionalInfo: Data was amended by Our World in Data to represent the total number of deaths and age-standardized death rate from all forms of violence. This includes the IHME GBD categories of 'interpersonal violence'; 'conflict and terrorism' and 'executions and police conflict'.
